org.batfish.grammar

Interface GrammarSettings

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Settings

    public interface GrammarSettings
    Settings for parsers and lexers

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean getDisableUnrecognized()
      Controls whether or not unrecognized lines will trigger recovery mode wherein they are collected and ignored, i.e.
      int getMaxParserContextLines()
      In error report, the maximum number of lines of context in a file surrounding a line triggering a parsing/lexing error.
      int getMaxParserContextTokens()
      In error report, the maximum number of lines of context tokens surrounding a line triggering a parsing/lexing error.
      int getMaxParseTreePrintLength()
      The maximum number of characters display of a parse tree when prettyPrinting.
      boolean getPrintParseTree()
      Controls whether parse trees are stored in parse job results.
      boolean getPrintParseTreeLineNums()
      Controls whether parse tree line numbers are printed in parse trees.
      boolean getThrowOnLexerError()
      Whether or not to throw an exception immediately upon a report of an error to the BatfishLexerErrorListener, ceasing processing for the given text.
      boolean getThrowOnParserError()
      Whether or not to throw an exception immediately upon a report of an error to the BatfishParserErrorListener, ceasing processing for the given text.

    • Method Detail

      • getDisableUnrecognized

        boolean getDisableUnrecognized()
        Controls whether or not unrecognized lines will trigger recovery mode wherein they are collected and ignored, i.e. they do not trigger a crash.
        Returns:
        true iff recovery from unrecognized lines is disabled

      • getMaxParserContextLines

        int getMaxParserContextLines()
        In error report, the maximum number of lines of context in a file surrounding a line triggering a parsing/lexing error.
        Returns:
        The max number of context lines

      • getMaxParserContextTokens

        int getMaxParserContextTokens()
        In error report, the maximum number of lines of context tokens surrounding a line triggering a parsing/lexing error.
        Returns:
        The max number of context tokens

      • getMaxParseTreePrintLength

        int getMaxParseTreePrintLength()
        The maximum number of characters display of a parse tree when prettyPrinting.
        Returns:
        The max number of characters to display

      • getPrintParseTree

        boolean getPrintParseTree()
        Controls whether parse trees are stored in parse job results.
        Returns:
        true iff parse trees should be stored in parse job results

      • getPrintParseTreeLineNums

        boolean getPrintParseTreeLineNums()
        Controls whether parse tree line numbers are printed in parse trees.
        Returns:
        true iff parse trees should include line numbers

      • getThrowOnLexerError

        boolean getThrowOnLexerError()
        Whether or not to throw an exception immediately upon a report of an error to the BatfishLexerErrorListener, ceasing processing for the given text.
        Returns:
        true iff an exception should be thrown immediately upon a report of an error to the BatfishLexerErrorListener

      • getThrowOnParserError

        boolean getThrowOnParserError()
        Whether or not to throw an exception immediately upon a report of an error to the BatfishParserErrorListener, ceasing processing for the given text.
        Returns:
        true iff an exception should be thrown immediately upon a report of an error to the BatfishParserErrorListener

      • setDisableUnrecognized

        void setDisableUnrecognized(boolean disableUnrecognized)
        See getDisableUnrecognized()
        Parameters:
        disableUnrecognized - The new value to be returned by subsequent calls to getDisableUnrecognized()

      • setPrintParseTree

        void setPrintParseTree(boolean printParseTree)
        See getPrintParseTree()
        Parameters:
        printParseTree - The new value to be returned by subsequent calls to getPrintParseTree()

      • setPrintParseTreeLineNums

        void setPrintParseTreeLineNums(boolean printParseTreeLineNums)
        See getPrintParseTreeLineNums()
        Parameters:
        printParseTreeLineNums - The new value to be returned by subsequent calls to getPrintParseTreeLineNums()

      • setThrowOnLexerError

        void setThrowOnLexerError(boolean throwOnLexerError)
        See getThrowOnLexerError()
        Parameters:
        throwOnLexerError - The new value to be returned by subsequent calls to getThrowOnLexerError()

      • setThrowOnParserError

        void setThrowOnParserError(boolean throwOnParserError)
        See getThrowOnParserError()
        Parameters:
        throwOnParserError - The new value to be returned by subsequent calls to getThrowOnParserError()
